[![](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/wip.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#wip) The general idea is to test the development of [`microclimr`](https://github.com/sylvainschmitt/microclimr) by reproducing analyses of the IMRPINT project on the forest microclimate from the Mormal, Blois and Aigoual forests.

## Usage

**imprint** analyses rely on the quarto documents `index.qmd` that can be run with R and associated environment defined with [renv](#0).

## Project

**imprint** includes:

-   Analyse of the data with associated documentation and figures:
    -   Reproductive analyses in `index``.qmd`
    -   Resulting page in `index.html`
-   All data in `data/`
-   R environment definition with [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/articles/renv.html) in `renv/` and `renv/lock`
-   R files (`.Rbuildignore` , `.Rdata` , `.Rprofile` , `.Rhistory`)
-   Git and GitHub files (`.gitignore`)
-   Project documentation (`README.qmd` , `README.md` , `NEWS.md` , `LICENSE`)
